title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (sample): 17 x 21.5 cm (6 11/16 x 8 7/16 in.)

creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Warp is pink boucle yarns. Weft is a wrapped silver foundation that alternates with supplementary weft of gray running over and under six warps.
